summary: A service class that centralizes all tag-related operations for resources, offering utilities to convert tag data structures, copy tags, retrieve tag dictionaries, check for tag presence, list tags, add tags, remove tags by name or object, delete all tags, extract tag names, flatten nested tag lists, and validate tag formats.
business_intent: Provides a unified interface for managing resource tags, supporting consistent organization, discovery, and policy enforcement across the system by handling tag creation, deletion, validation, and querying.
